website_summaries.verdict: An attractive form factor and a good feature set give the JBL Micro Wireless a leg up in the tiny wireless speaker competition.
pros: The JBL Micro Wireless Bluetooth speaker is a compact, hockey-puck-size speaker that has a built-in lithium ion rechargeable battery and offers good sound for its size
It also has an integrated line-in cable that stows away in the bottom of the device
cons: Doesn't handle big bass well and distorts at higher volumes

customer_reviews.title: Order from JBL/HARMON only
customer_reviews.text: This little thing did a good job of putting out the tunes. 6 outta 10, thats all. The BT button broke a few weeks ago. Contacted JBL/ Harmon, the company that owns JBL. they informed me this item I had ordered was COUNTERFEIT. They did replace it though with a newer version called The Clip. HUGE difference between the counterfeit and this Clip. Glad I went thru Harmon for this replacement, otherwise the seller DOSHISHA DREAM would have probably sent me another fake. the Clip from JBL/Harmon is well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: john G

customer_reviews.title: Great except the all too easily adjustable volume wheel
customer_reviews.text: I would have given it 5 stars but I got it to use while playing disc golf, and so I attached it to my bag but the volume is controlled by a dial on the side and it gets moved way too easily. When the speaker bounces around as I'm walking, it constantly hits the volume wheel up against the side of the bag and changes the volume every few minutes and so it's very annoying to have the change back the volume all the time.
customer_reviews.author: patrick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound for how small this is. I don't expect Bose quality for $20 but for hanging out or on an outdoor adventure (we take the Rzr to the river often and this is perfect) Small so it is easy to pack around. Battery lasts quite a while and i LOVE that you recharge it instead of replace batteries all the time. You can even buy more than one and hook them together for double the sounds. My husband also takes it to construction sites and uses it for some music while he is out working on houses. Bluetooth reaches pretty far too!
customer_reviews.author: kbrownaz

customer_reviews.title: Great product, but no stereo
customer_reviews.text: Really great product with great sound and I have had no Bluetooth connectivity issue. I have given it only 4 starts for these reasons: 1. The very short built in cord to allow the speaker to be daisy chained to another speaker is VERY flimsy and IMO will not last under regular usage. And because its built in you cannot replace it. JBL should have made this an 1/8" port and you supply your own cord. 2. Daisy chaining the speakers together does NOT give you stereo nor any appreciable gain in the sound volume. Yes, the product's description implies otherwise. Repeat - you cannot get separate right and left channel stereo sound out of these speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Rbaker

customer_reviews.title: Bye-bye, JBL
customer_reviews.text: It was a good speaker while it lasted and I actually liked it a lot. But today it suddenly died. It lasted me a little over 3 years and it wasn't used often. I tried to pair it with my iPhone and the blue light started blinking as it's supposed to, but the iPhone couldn't detect it and the blue light never turned back to steady. Then I tried to use it with my iPad, as I always did, and this time the iPad couldn't detect it anymore either. Poor thing just died on me. I gave it two stars instead of one because it was a good speaker when it worked.
customer_reviews.author: SmokieTopaz

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful toy!!!
customer_reviews.text: good sound and volume. Simple to use, I have three of these and love each one!! Works with my Shuffle, tablets and any other device that needs better amplification of volume. Rich sound. Blue tooth allows me to listen to audio books/music etc. while the tablet is on picnic table and the speaker is 25 feet from tablet. I am 20 feet from speaker (i.e. a 50' distance from tablet to me) so I can do my whole yard and still hear music. If I'm feeling particularly naughty, I'll crank up the volume to drown out the neighbor's screaming children. They do not appreciate Beethoven. Love this product.
customer_reviews.author: nonyer bizness

customer_reviews.title: Decent, when it works
customer_reviews.text: Well it lasted about a year and a few months, and during that time, I was happy with it's performance. The sound was surprisingly decent for a speaker of this size and was quite loud. I'd often use it while travelling and link it to my ipad/iphone. Unfortunately the other day when I tried to charge it, it will not hold a charge anymore. JBL's customer support for this item states the battery cannot be replaced, so I'm not sure what the next step is - check the warranty I guess. Anyway, for the price (when it works) it's a solid performer, although I'm not sure I can totally recommend it since mine is now dead.
customer_reviews.author: Anon

customer_reviews.title: neat
customer_reviews.text: Been using 3 months, works well. Battery life is as good or better than expected. Louder and clearer than expected, fills a 2 car garage with enough music to make me happy for the price. Great for music while you cook, wrench on a car, camp, etc, ad-n. The 3.5mm output is a neat feature, allows you to control/stream audio to an old living room speaker setup or your car etc.
customer_reviews.author: RyanAssoc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent sound from portable bluetooth speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent bluetooth speaker. I honestly was shocked with the quality and speaker max volume when I first heard it. Given the pricing ($36 on black Friday sale on Amazon) it was a no brainer. Though I have to admit I wasn't expecting much. It comes with a carrying case and charging cable. I will admit one minor quibble is the charging cable is quite short but anyone with a longer usb charging cable can take care of this (hence no stars deducted). Overall the sound is a great the max volume is great and the shape/compactness is quite nice. The red color is nice. It is more of a cherry red color.
customer_reviews.author: tmybrgr

customer_reviews.title: Big sound, small package
customer_reviews.text: After reading some of the negative posts on this item I was reluctant to try it but am glad I did. I did receive a unit that has a serial number which is the one that got great reviews. Some posts referred to non-serialized units that appeared to be knock offs. What I can say is that this speaker is amazing for its size. It puts out a big sound that almost matches my Bose SoundLink Mini but much smaller and lighter. I have tried many portable BT speakers but none have matched this one in terms of sound for the size.
customer_reviews.author: C. Riley

customer_reviews.title: This little guy is just fantastic. It sounds wonderful in small spaces and the ...
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is just fantastic. It sounds wonderful in small spaces and the bluetooth is easy to use. You can also daisy chain multiple speakers together, if you'd like. It is a nice portable size and light weight. I've had this now for over two years and even though it says the battery will last ~5 hours on a charge, it has never lasted fewer than 10 for me and I use this EVERY night. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Candace

customer_reviews.title: awesome, small, and portable
customer_reviews.text: For the cost, this is an awesome speaker! Charges quickly and includes usb charging cable. Connects easily to bluetooth or using the built in cable (cable wraps around the device for storage which is clever to prevent losing or kinking it). Sound quality is very good with almost no distortion all the way to max volume, which is surprisngly loud and deep considering the size of the device. It's incredible how portable speaker quality has improved. We use this one as a mobile house speaker and for weekend motorcycle trips (packing it takes no space) and are really satisfied with it.
customer_reviews.author: azjmw

customer_reviews.title: Definately Worth Buying.
customer_reviews.text: I love this little speaker. It has a rich quality to the sound and has quite a lot of bass for such a small speaker. Ive had it for over 5 months now and I use it every day at work and at night when I want to listen to my iPad before going to bed. It sounds phenomenal and easily connects to my iPhone and iPad via blue tooth. There is also a 3.5 headphone jack that will connect it to any device that supports one and may not have blue tooth. I would recommend this to anyone who wants great sound on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Loki Shams

customer_reviews.title: It's a Wow-and I don't like Bluetooth
customer_reviews.text: i have not had much success with getting worthwhile sound from any Bluetooth thingy except this-not plug-in-the-back-of your-stereo receivers, not car speakers/talkers, not wireless ear buds or headphones-they all have really clipped and squished sound. To me. Sent those things all back and gave up on Bluetooth. But this thing does the opposite. Opens it up!, gets the bass in the house, kitchen cooking using phone as source, bathroom time-good job. Wow!
customer_reviews.author: D. Rohrdanz

customer_reviews.title: Fabulous sound. Wire setup not so great.
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker so much that I have bought another one. However, the wire/plug seems to shorten over time, and pulling on it to tuck it back into the bottom of the device weakens the cord, which on both, eventually did not fit there. I leave them hanging, and I still prefer this speaker ot any others I have used. I'd buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dougherty McGee

customer_reviews.title: Not for use with PC
customer_reviews.text: Product would not connect to my PC via Bluetooth although the PC recognized the device and was able to select the speaker as the audio output device. I contacted customer support and was directed to contact my PC manufacturer, or Microsoft since I run an MS OS. I opted to return it and not deal with the hassle. I know this speaker works well with cell phones, but that is not what I purchased it for.
customer_reviews.author: TPM

customer_reviews.title: Had higher hopes, but sound through Bluetooth connection is ok
customer_reviews.text: Price-wise, these are great. When you connect with Bluetooth, sound comes out very clear and loud. No fancy bass stuff, but it's a mini speaker so that's expected. It just amplifies what you connect it to. What I *did* expect was to have clear sound when I used the headphone jack instead of Bluetooth. Using the jack was awful, the sound was muffled, the audio is not good at all. I was so surprised at how bad it was! So if you're getting this, just use it with Bluetooth devices and connect through Bluetooth, don't even bother with the jack.
customer_reviews.author: Farah

customer_reviews.title: The volume and quality of sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is the second small JBL Micro Wireless Speaker that I had bought. I use this speaker a few hours a day about 5 days a week. The first one I bought no longer re-charges (thus the 4 star review). I am a backup singer in a band and this allows me to practice anywhere. Usually with small speakers, you lose the quality of sound, not with this one. You can clearly identify the different ranges and there is a beautiful balance between highs, mids and yes...even bass. The volume and quality of sound is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Loud, Clear Sound, but wire needs to be longer
customer_reviews.text: I like this little speaker. Quite loud and clear. Charges quickly. Easy radial dial wheel for loudness. The only Con I don't like is the short wire. I wished that the wire was at least 12 inches long. Wire is too short for me. Now I watch movies from my tablet and sometimes I forget that the sound comes out of this speaker when I thought it was coming from my tablet's speakers. If the wire were longer, I would give it 5 stars. Compared to 2 speakers for computers, this one is not quite good enough or loud enough for me to use it as a computer speaker, but good enough for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: 3dfx

customer_reviews.title: If you wan't portable and quality JBL Micro is it!
customer_reviews.text: As far as ultra portables go the JBL micro is exactly what I was looking for. Sound-A+ good bass and clear sound. Volume-A- could be a bit louder not complaining though it's loud enough. Battery-A++ lithium ion says it all, I use it at least an hour a day and have not charged in 7 days! Controls-A simple, power and volume no pause or skip. Conectivity-A+ has not failed me yet. Portability-A++ put it in your pocket and go or clip it to you. Previous speaker was the Jam Classic. The only good thing about it was sound otherwise it sucked. Poor overall rating for Jam Classic don't waste your money and make the mistake as I did.
customer_reviews.author: Dirk  Walker

customer_reviews.title: I really like it and use it often
customer_reviews.text: Tremendous sound is produced by this little speaker. I really like it and use it often.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C. Erickson

customer_reviews.title: Really is a great speaker.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this after my experience with the XBOOM unit. It's small, has a great sound, light enough to fit in my suitcase or backpack. Wish it had a remote, but other than that, for it's size and weight it's really great. Good bass, clear highs and mid ranges, good volume and I don't loose the BT connection. Cotton velvet case.... with it was more leather like, but WTH. I never travel without it. Enough said.
customer_reviews.author: G. Boone

customer_reviews.title: Perfect wireless speaker for its size.
customer_reviews.text: I think for its size, its perfect. There's really not much more I could realistically ask for. Great battery life, great, loud sound, surprising amount of bass, given its size. Pairs up flawlessly with my phone. And the manual volume dial is great - not everything is better in digital form. The analog dial allows for fast adjustment of volume, rather than '+' or '-' buttons you have to continuously press to get the volume to change, and whose settings might get cleared out. With the analog volume dial, you are guaranteed to have the volume you left it at, and have a much more convenient and fast way to change the volume.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lee

customer_reviews.title: small but strong
customer_reviews.text: This blue tooth speaker is amazing. I bought this as a gift for a family member and they love it. when I saw them using it I was surprised to see such a mall speaker have such clear loud volume. Its small enough to fit everywhere I even think it would be ok to put it on a lawnyard with your keys I think its that convenient. then the sound it produces doesn't disappoint. it maybe small but its strong.
customer_reviews.author: judy blakely

customer_reviews.title: Does What I Need It To
customer_reviews.text: Good sound output quality and quantity. I use it primarily with my iPad when I travel, and it is small and lightweight. Two possible improvements could include: (1) some kind of kickstand (I had to rig something up to get it to stand upright on a desk or table), and (2) maybe a carabiner to take advantage of the handle. The handle opening is fairly small, so had to shop to find one that would fit.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua C. Delaney

customer_reviews.title: Small in every way
customer_reviews.text: Works well when it works. Bluetooth capability stopped working after a few months. Not as durable and expected from JBL. Maybe it was dropped but that should not mess up the bluetooth but it did. Compact design is a little cumbersome. The attached wrap-around wire is too short. I would have rather had a separate wire that is longer for direct connections since now that bluetooth does not work anymore. The sound is okay. Don't expect much from any compact speaker design. Big, accurate & clear sound will always require a larger design.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: This a very good sounding speaker for its size. I have owned it for about 8 months and it connects to my iphone via bluetooth with no problems at all. Battery life is at least 4 hours at moderate volume. It has also hit the floor a few times with no damage. I would purchase again. I have now owned this speaker for nearly a year. It has run as long as 10 hours with no recharge. It has held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tom C

customer_reviews.title: Good idea, failed product.
customer_reviews.text: Great little Bluetooth speaker. I enjoyed it very much the first couple of times I used it. When I tried to turn it off tonight, it would not turn off. Very disappointing. Seems if I have to leave it on to let the battery run out before recharging, rather than turning it off between uses it fails the usability test. i would loathe having to replace the battery on this thing every six months. Not sure I could recommend, and rather certain I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: J. Price

customer_reviews.title: Obsolete
customer_reviews.text: This speaker was good when it came out, but it is now obsolete. I recommend anyone looking at this speaker to take a look at the JBL Clip 2 instead. It performs significantly better in every way possible. Sound quality, loudness, buttons instead of a wheel for volume adjustment, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Vin

customer_reviews.title: JBL Wireless Speaker
customer_reviews.text: Such an awesome sound. Big and with a nice bass fullness. I love this little speaker. However.... sigh...after just six months of very conservative usage it just stopped. So I sent it back and ordered a new one so I would have two. The new one arrived and works great but the one that was replaced arrived with a faulty button. I really don't have time to keep writng a sending stuff back that should really be JBL quality. This brand has always been amazing. As I said the sound is wonderful, however the durability issue is concerning. So far two out of three have had problems. Gamble at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Head of the Pack Portable Speaker
customer_reviews.text: very portable, very good sound, easily pairs with all bluetooth devices that I've used it with. Besides the great sound - the built-in aux wire and it's ability to be daisy chained with other speakers really help this speaker stand out against it's competitors. The little handle/hook is an amazing addition as well for hanging this during certain situations. Fits great on a towel/door hook, providing a great soundtrack to the morning shower!! I own a few different competing units, including the jambox and Sharkk - and I still find myself using this unit above all the others.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie D

customer_reviews.title: surprising
customer_reviews.text: Surprisingly good sound from this little speaker. Always like JBL products and this is added to the list. Was looking at something to take to the pool in the summer but leave my tablet in the house and yet not have to string out wires or use ear phones...this is almost perfect. I reviewed other speakers and decide on this one, good choice. The only drawback I guess but it's not the speakers fault is the limited distance for the Bluetooth signals @ 25 feet, keep that in mind when tagging this around, still good though.
customer_reviews.author: old flyer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: These are powerful little speakers. I love them. I bought two of them because I thought being so small two would be better but you really don't need two at least for loudness. My daughter bought her son one for his birthday (he's only 8) to use with his iPod and he likes it. It's durable for responsible kids to use and better for them than the earbuds in their ears. I do wish the cord was a little longer for direct connection but don't let that discourage you. If you use the Bluetooth connection you don't need it. Great sound! The seller was very, very good I and would buy from them again.
customer_reviews.author: KJK

customer_reviews.title: Flawless [mostly]
customer_reviews.text: If you use this thing for what it was designed for in my opinion it has no flaws. Longer than 5 hrs. battery time would be one recommendation [8 would be perfect for me]. It is solid, hefty, ergonomic, easy to use and the sound is super! I use it at work when I'm doing small jobs/service calls where client is home or bring in a large job-site radio does not make sense. They say you can link [daisy-chain] multiples for more/better sound, not really a feature for me. I like to connect to my phone and listen to music files or Pandora while I work. Cant beat the price!
customer_reviews.author: A. LOCOCO

customer_reviews.title: clear! Terrific!
customer_reviews.text: I agree with the reviewer who said this speaker is clearer than the HMDX Audio JAM Bluetooth Wireless Speaker. I own both and do prefer this one. I have had many in fact, and this is the best I have owned. I wouldn't listen to music on any small speaker, but I listen to radio shows with this one, in the kitchen. So I need a speaker that is clear for the human voice, and loud enough to hear while making kitchen type noises. This one works for me. I do recommend it highly.
customer_reviews.author: RoseV

customer_reviews.title: A portable speaker with the greatest sound and the perfect size
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most amazing wireless speakers you can get in the market. The sound quality is great for bright tones and basses, and its size and portability makes it a must have for travelling or listening music outdoors. Despite its small size, the volume it can reach without sound distortions is unbelievable. I also find extremely practical to be able to charge it with the same charger for my Kindle and my Android phone Didn't give it the 5 stars because I still think it is a bit overpriced, and I didn't entirely like the colors available.
customer_reviews.author: A. Diaz

customer_reviews.title: Couldn't get it to daisy chain, so one star lost for specific performance.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is good, and it is loud, but these speakers don't want to daisy chain wirelessly as advertised. I was only able to get two speakers worth of sound by connecting it with the attached cords, and then one speaker was perpetually quieter than the other. The problem seems to be that, at the Bluetooth level, the device only wants to recognize one speaker at a time. If anyone has a solution to fix this, I will restore the star, because the only reason I bought these two speakers was for the daisy chain capabilities.
customer_reviews.author: AdriannicusTop Contributor: Fountain Pens

customer_reviews.title: Best Amazon purchase all year!
customer_reviews.text: Best purchase all year! A friend recommended this when I said I was looking for a small, portable Bluetooth speaker for use with my iPhone. I use it in my bathroom in the morning to listen to iTunes Radio and in my office to listen to my playlists. It holds power pretty well, is uncomplicated to charge, comes on all kinds of great colors, has great sound (even has a bass booster), and is easy to pair. My boyfriend and his dad liked it so much after I took it on a camping trip that they each bought the same one! You won't be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Laverty

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: For it's size this is a great speaker. The sound is far better than you would expect from this small of speaker. OK, it's not the speaker I would want for any high fidelity music listening, but for spoken sound or casual listen on the go, this is pretty good. I like that there is a physical volume control on it that says where I put it. I like that the Bluetooth automatically connects up. The battery life seems more than enough for me, but I really have pushed it. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Clyde

customer_reviews.title: Bang for your buck - and surprisingly loud
customer_reviews.text: I love, love, love this speaker. I'm going to buy a second one because I love it so much. It was smaller than I'd imagine it would be, so I was afraid the sound quality would suffer. It surprised me with how loud and robust the sound quality is for such a small thing. The bass isn't very strong, as other reviewers have mentioned, but I'm not too crazy about overwhelmingly loud bass anyway. I get enough of that via my noisy musician neighbors... :-/ The only negative is that the USB charge cable is super short.
customer_reviews.author: Linzy

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This speaker works great. It is quite small but has great sound. Syncs up to bluetooth on my android phone quickly and easily. I wish I got the newer model as it is cheaper and you can connect more than one of these badboys together for "surround" sound. Great for outside/inside whatever. Wish the little clip actually opened up like a caribener. The battery life is pretty damn good. I don't think it came with a charging cable fyi.
customer_reviews.author: J. Goldstein

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 11-inch Macbook Air since its speakers are sometimes hard to hear. This little speaker is amazing. It connected to the Bluetooth perfectly the first time. I also have connected it to my iPad Mini and iPhone 5. You just have to remember that if all the devices are in the same vicinity, you need to disconnect the ones you're not using as it can only pair with one device at a time. The speaker really belts out the sound.
customer_reviews.author: Cherie Brune

customer_reviews.title: Power in a Small Package
customer_reviews.text: Bought this speaker used "Like New". It arrived in perfect condition as described. The manufacturer's instruction were included. The Bluetooth paired without a hitch to my iPhone, iPad and MacBook. So far it has worked flawlessly and the sound quality amazes for such a compact (easily transports in shirt, jacket or pants pocket) and inexpensive speaker. My son brought one of these with him to Maine for his summer vacation, so I had familiarized myself with it prior to ordering mine. I would recommend this speaker to a friend.
customer_reviews.author: Roy

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING deal. $30 from dealtastic and same day delivery
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING deal. $30 from dealtastic and same day delivery. The sound is unreal. The bass and clarity - is amazing. Bluetooth works perfectly. Some of the bluetooth speakers sometime don't work well, either static or has a difficult time connecting. I use it in my apt as I'm without real speakers right now. Having a difficult time spending a lot $ on speakers. This little speaker does the trick for now. I'm really impressed and happy. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: L.M P

customer_reviews.title: Still happy with it after 3 years
customer_reviews.text: The battery life and bluetooth range on this speaker are great even after almost 3 years of use. Not only does this speaker sound better than the OontZ Curve, it's also substantially lighter making it much more portable. The volume dial on the JBL is also much more user friendly than the volume buttons on the Curve which are shared with the playlist controls. Pairing it with my phone was effortless and on powering up it seems to re-establish the connection more quickly than the Curve did.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonShopper

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight sound for the music lover on the go.
customer_reviews.text: These are great. I ordered two and regularly blue tooth them both to music on my cell phone. The speakers have great sound and easily are loud enough to provide good sound in a hotel room or room of similar size. The sound is clear and full spectrum. They are light and I use them while running with good effect. I have carried one in a hip bag at Disney for a full days available soundtrack. I often travel with them, they traveled all over Europe with me, a great lightweight sound system for a music lover on the go.
customer_reviews.author: Mr.Mojo in CO.

customer_reviews.title: using it for traveling.
customer_reviews.text: for a small blu-tooth speaker they sound pretty good. I use this when I travel and want to watch a movie on the ipad. it will fill the hotel room with sound. I thought they were so good I got 3 of them. the kids use them all the time. battery seems to last and it recharges in 6 hours. I still use it when it is charging. this is loud enough that if it is cranked to max the neighbors in the adjacent rooms complain...!
customer_reviews.author: R. J. S.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice sound from a small package
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to stream songs from my laptops and cell phone. Out of the box it was charged up and I actually have not had to charge it again yet after using several times. Easy to pair with both the phone and laptops and the sound is very good from a small speaker, much better than the speakers on the phone or laptops. I got this on sale so it was a better deal for me than what I see it selling for now. I wouldn't mind buying a bigger model that maybe ran off of 110v power to get much louder but volume is sufficient for normal listening and max volume is still crisp and clear.
customer_reviews.author: Chris M

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic product.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. I bought it a few years ago and it still works like brand new. JBL's sound quality is off the chain.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: it has very good Wireless range
customer_reviews.text: A compact speaker with a big sound, it has very good Wireless range, the battery is lasting 2.5 to 3.5 hours depending on the volume you chose, the music quality it delivers is superior for the speaker size. It is extremely small and portable and it comes with a charging cable and cover. I can easily recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Love my new JBL micro portable speaker! I love the sound & ease of carrying! Thank you!❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love my my JBL micro wireless portable speaker - great sound, light to carry around, & sleek. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Diana Silva

customer_reviews.title: You won't believe it!
customer_reviews.text: Just got this yesterday. I can't believe how good it sounds and how small and light it is. It's only about 3.5 inches wide, and 1.5 inches tall. It's TINY. No problems hooking it up to my Nexus 4 or Asus 300TF. I know I am going to use this everywhere. In the garage, on the patio, on vacation, in the bathroom, any place I want to listen to music and there aren't standard speakers around. Doesn't come with a USB charger, so make sure you have the one for your phone or other devices with you to charge it. it's crazy good!
customer_reviews.author: TJP

customer_reviews.title: These are miraculously good sounding
customer_reviews.text: I think I could be called a semi or 3/4 audiophile type person. Probably would be a full fledged one if my budget accommodated that... The sound is full, - not lacking deep ends and loud without distorting. For amplifying a laptop I practically never needed to run both, that would be only in some big room with audience setup. Very happy, never though such a small thing could perform like that. It is like they managed to put the quality of a headphone into a loudspeaker.
customer_reviews.author: George O. Fuhrmann

customer_reviews.title: This is the "brass ring" of miniature speakers
customer_reviews.text: What a great little speaker this is.............it has the sound of much larger speakers due to the bass port that has been added. I can keep it in my breast pocket or hang it around my neck and enjoy a superior sounding speaker all day long. It has been highly rated, deservedly so!. If you are looking for a high quality small speaker at a small price buy this one. You will not be disappointed. Kudos to JBL who is a high quality manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Jack

customer_reviews.title: JBL micro bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting this little speaker to light up a room. However, it is good for what I wanted. A speaker for my desk so I can hear some highs and lows. It serves the purpose but, it is nothing to get excited over. At low volumes, the highs hides, within the base. Which makes the sound sort of "hallow". I like to judge a speaker on how efficient it is at low volumes. This JBL speaker barely passes that test. Other than that, it will work. In the words of Star Child, from the CHOCOLATE CITY album, "sounds like it got a three on it, to me".
customer_reviews.author: Lennie

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this speaker and I use it all the time. It easily fits in a backpack or purse. We've taken it to the beach, the lake, camping, etc. and people are always impressed by the sound it puts out. I also use it quite a bit while cleaning or doing chores in my apartment, and it is loud enough to hear it well in the three rooms (medium-sized bedroom, small living room and kitchen). I was skeptical about the price, since it is so small, but it definitely is worth it.
customer_reviews.author: Matt

customer_reviews.title: Incredible - EDIT: Cheap.
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic, loud, clear sound even at full volume. Has some trouble switching automatically between two separate Bluetooth devices but nothing a quick off/on doesn't remedy. EDIT 8/5/2015 - Down from 5 stars to 1. Broken after just over one year, about 10-15 uses, and a similar number of charges/usb disconnections. It essentially sat on my kitchen counter for 9 months of its life. The micro USB charging port no longer functions at all. Super disappointing after originally being extremely happy with this BT speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Spence

customer_reviews.title: Sound is amazing for this little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have bought three of this and they have lasted through many many many recharges. Sound is amazing for this little speaker, people are always stopping me to ask "Where it that music coming from?" The one feature I'd like to have is an indicator of how much better life is left. A little read light will start flashing but sometimes you have quite a bit of time left, other times not. I guess you can't build everything into such a small item, and I'd rather have the sound and long battery life, both of which are great.
customer_reviews.author: donna

customer_reviews.title: JBL made in PRC China.
customer_reviews.text: JBL made in PRC China says it all. At $29.99 for the pink one that is a stretch. $49.95 no way. This is not high fidelity anything. It is a 1" speaker. Syncs easy however sound is like a transistor radio. If you had no speaker and were hard up for something to listen to that is it. There is no bass at all. Portable yes. Better than nothing yes. Sound quality no.
customer_reviews.author: Bradford Page

customer_reviews.title: Great small speaker.
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker. It's works great with Bluetooth on my droid phone. I plugged it into my phone where the headphone jack is (even though you can charge it and use it like a Cel phone without the cord) to save power and listened to it for two hours out by the pool with my two children. They love to hear their music too. Sound quality is clear and is amazingly loud for such a little item. I would give this as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: JAS

customer_reviews.title: Small, powerful, and mobile!
customer_reviews.text: Small and full of sound. I take this thing outside with me when I'm working in the yard, hang it up by the hot tub when I relax, and use it to fill the house with music when were cleaning. I spent time checking reviews on a lot of speakers and felt I made the right decision when I picked this one. **Iphone Users** I noticed that the IPhone has issues pairing with this speaker after you turn the speaker off. Simply select "forget this device" under settings > Bluetooth and it will allow you to pair the speaker again.
customer_reviews.author: David Pearce

customer_reviews.title: If you want the best get the JBL Pulse.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice low cost and easy way to get Blue Tooth with sound that is overall good for the price. If you want the best get the JBL Pulse. Beats the JBL Charge slightty Crushes the JBL Flip The Mini Jambox sounds about as nice as the Pulse (better than the Charge and Flip and the Micro), but it is too soft. I also listened to some Klipch BT Speakers and liked the Pulse and Jambox better.
customer_reviews.author: papa_fabuloso

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound for the Price
customer_reviews.text: I was seeking a cheap Bluetooth speaker to compliment my laptop's not-so-loud speakers. Got one of these during holiday deal time, and am not disappointed. This is not a Bose speaker, then again it's a whole lot cheaper than a Bose speaker. Can't compare to the Jawbone or similar models, but will say, for a speaker that's about the size of my (little) fist, it sounds darn good for what it is. Tested just fine with my laptop, phone and tablet. I'm impressed with the quality, especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mail Debaser

customer_reviews.title: Very durable! Long lasting!
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Easy to use. My husband absolutely loves it. We have had it for years and it still sounds great. Amazing buy!
customer_reviews.author: Corrine Bayline

customer_reviews.title: Charging light broke after three months, but JBL replaced it very quickly.
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is pretty good from such a small device, and the manual volume control is way more convenient than volume up and down buttons. The speaker connected flawlessly to my Samsung Galaxy Mega 5.8, and has a range of about 15 or 20 feet. The charging light stopped working after about three months, but the speaker still charged and worked perfectly other than the charging indicator light. JBL's excellent customer service had it replaced within one week of me returning it. The return process was VERY easy.
customer_reviews.author: David Suich

customer_reviews.title: Great sound!
customer_reviews.text: This little beauty pumps out great sound for its size. I use it in my shop to stream Pandora and Google Music to. The battery lasts about 7 hrs at full volume and it puts out enough sound to fill my 1500 sq ft shop. The highs can break up at max volume unless you apply some EQ to the source, but the sound is crisp and clear. The Bluetooth range is excellent. I place it on a shelf in my shop and stream music from my laptop in my office with two walls between the devices. I let my wife use it and now I have to buy another...
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Holy great sound
customer_reviews.text: I do a lot of training in rooms where I have to rent sound. I talk loud enough that I don't need a microphone, but sometimes I want to play something off my computer and my laptop speakers aren't loud enough. I love this speaker because it's bluetooth AND wired, so I can connect it to my laptop. I've used this in training sessions with up to 75 people in one room and the sound is excellent. We also used this when traveling to play off our iPods/phones. It's small enough to travel easily but has big sound.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen

customer_reviews.title: Top-notch speaker
customer_reviews.text: Amazing speaker. Great range; can be in one room listening to it while my ipad is in another room. My Ipad has a very bad speaker, and this little speaker really cranks out the volume. I use it to listen to youtube, mostly spoken, and it is very clear in picking up voices. I cannot attest to it for music however, as I do not use it for that purpose. Lasts a while before needing charging again. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Rumpled

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I was at a place and a person had one and I was blown away at how loud it was and how good it sounded as some people that I know have a cheaper model and you can barely hear what they have and so I ended up ordering this one hoping it would sound just as good and so far I am not disappointed with the unit it is nice and clear and like someone said that it has a manual volume control which is great and the fact that it is blue tooth and so far it has paired up to everything that I have and so I love this little unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I had a JBL speaker like this a few years ago and lost it
customer_reviews.text: I had a JBL speaker like this a few years ago and lost it, and was so happy to find another one identical to it and for an excellent price. I ordered two of them and am very happy with their performance and the sound quality. Pairing them to the smart phones was a breeze and took less than 5 minutes to pair both of them. I would buy these again and highly recommend them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Candace OwensTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Works great with my iPhone
customer_reviews.text: I like this because it is small and has a magnet on the back. We got this for use in our classic cars. I wanted something that would interface with the iPhone to play music while driving, but I also did not want to modify the car. I gave this 4 stars only because it does not amplify the sound as much as I would have expected. It works fine in every other respect but the volume is just a little lower than I expected. I would still recommend this to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Hawkflyer

customer_reviews.title: Loved the first one so much
customer_reviews.text: Loved the first one so much, bought a second for work. I had several Nokia 360's which have absolutely amazing sound; however the quality was poor, each Nokia broke just after one year and the cost of that unit has sky rocketed. This unit is SMALL, and has adequate sound projection for work and home use. So far the reliability has been excellent and it's an affordable price.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Amazon has replaced it twice and now the new one acts as though it has a bad connection and sound cuts in and out
customer_reviews.text: Works for about 6-8 weeks then refuses to connect to Bluetooth. All I get is a message on my cell phone saying "make sure Bluetooth device is turned on and in range". Amazon has replaced it twice and now the new one acts as though it has a bad connection and sound cuts in and out. JBL customer spoke very broken English and was useless. Anyone else have a similar problem. When it works, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: DW

customer_reviews.title: Great lil Speaker..!!!
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is Great. I have quite a few, but this one at its low price and weight and size is really the bonus. It's got a good sound, not heavy on the bass really, but still nice clarity and sound. It's also a Great speaker for connecting to other devices hence controlling the device using your personal phone, comp, iPad,etc.....since it has an Output plug. Most other speakers that have an output jack or plug are much more expensive, larger, and heavier. This ones great for traveling or for your garage or studio, and works great connect to your stereo and control it using Bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S.

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Bought one years ago and my wife loved it so much she had me buy this one. I use it all the time to listen to Pandora while I work around the house. She likes her's when watching movies on her iPad. Also good for background music at parties,
customer_reviews.author: Big Dave

customer_reviews.title: This little thing pumps out decent sound for an office ...
customer_reviews.text: This little thing pumps out decent sound for an office or working in the basement or small garage. Bass is decent but if the room is big it's not going to thump it up. Only other Bluetooth challenger I have seen is the large Bose unit for around $200. No issues pairing but read the instructions the first time.
customer_reviews.author: Addicted to Prime

customer_reviews.title: Lot of sound packed into this tiny disc
customer_reviews.text: - Good sound quality with a nice range of volume - Easy to pair with bluetooth enabled devices - Full charge seems to last about 8-10 hours of use, which is not an inconvenience - Like 'scalability' as you can daisy chain multiple together if you choose for a more powerful set up. Would prefer to have a wireless daisy chaining mechanism but not sure if that's feasible to develop Really not complaints here. The price point is a bit higher than its counterparts made by other brands but for the quality and ease of use, I think it's worth an extra 10 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: Solar_Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, even if it's tiny!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wireless alternative to a much larger iphone speaker I bought years ago. This one was reasonably priced and well reviewed, so I picked it. When I received it, it was so much smaller than I expected. It's about the size of the palm of my hand. I thought there was no way that tiny thing would sound good, but it really does! It does as good a job as my older speaker that's the size of two shoe boxes. Very happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Ariane209

customer_reviews.title: Great speakers
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for vacation..... Worked perfect on the beach. Base and treble worked perfect for 70s and 80s music....and 90s too. All through pandora Pros: good strong sound Easy bluetooth sync - no delays (iPhone 5, 4 IPad 2/3) Battery lasted for almost 6hours Attached headphone jack for direct connect to iPhone worked perfect when I didn't want to use Bluetooth Decent price - at $50 Sounds good sitting flat on table - picks up good base vs standing up Cons: Not much... Might buy another for full stereo like sound
customer_reviews.author: MR13 NJ

customer_reviews.title: Great little speaker! You will love this!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my teen daughter for Christmas- we ALL loved it- we used it for the rest of the day. The sound quality is excellent. Don't know what those other people are talking about "distortion", "hard to hook up", my teen was using it within a couple minutes of opening it! Highly recommend this- it sounds awesome- you will be pleased with this purchase. It also comes with a small drawstring pouch to protect it from scratches when you take it places- and you WILL take it places- this thing is pretty much with my daughter during all of her waking hours- she even takes it to work after school.
customer_reviews.author: jjen

customer_reviews.title: Best sound I have heard
customer_reviews.text: I tried a few others and this is by far the best sounding one. It is clear and crisp with just enough bass to make it worth the extra money (compared to others). Solid design, easy Bluetooth setup, and with the cord, can save battery and get even more power/sound from it. I also really like the manual volume dial so you can get the extra right volume you want. The ability to hang it from a hook or nail is also cool to ensure the sound carries around furniture/people.
customer_reviews.author: Surfmly

customer_reviews.title: Great sound for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love this little speaker. Good quality sound for a small speaker.
customer_reviews.author: ridingsochorse

customer_reviews.title: Get this if..
customer_reviews.text: ...you want a small portable speaker with very good sound, and easy Bluetooth connectivity. This speaker really exceeded my expectations for sound. The fullness of sound is remarkable for such a small unit. Connecting via Bluetooth was effortlessly done to my iPad Mini. Everyone I've shown this to, has been impressed enough to go get one themselves. The bonus is battery life, as I consistently get more than 5 hours on a charge. This is a product that is easy to recommend!
customer_reviews.author: LKLD

customer_reviews.title: The Bluetooth has quit working on and off. It ...
customer_reviews.text: The Bluetooth has quit working on and off. It connects and makes a noise but when using through Spotify it sometimes acts up and I have to turn everything off/on and re-connect, sometimes I have to play through iTunes first and then spotify will connect again. I was hesitant because of other reviews stating this and thought it was a fluke. Doesn't seem to be, I'm waiting on it to quit connecting all together. Probably wouldn't purchase it again.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Speakah box
customer_reviews.text: Probably my favorite portable bluetooth speaker. I've owned one before and it really took a beating. Lasted me a little over a year and that's with it mainly being used in an outdoor work setting. Even though it's not waterproof, I've had it out in the rain and it's been fine. Great sound and volume for the size and it pairs with all your bluetooth devices no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Wavy D

customer_reviews.title: Excellent, portable
customer_reviews.text: One of my friends had a cube bluetooth speaker which was great and I was debating between that one and the one I ultimately purchased. The product is great, portable, superb battery life. I can't decide whether I like the JBL I bought or the cube more. The reason I gave 4 instead of 5 stars is because I expected the volume to be louder than the max is on this device. Otherwise it's great and great for the cost.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed

customer_reviews.title: Get 2!! Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: Can not be happier with this little monster. Unbelievable sound from a small "puck" speaker. We had a Altec Lansing puck speaker that we loved but ran across one of there and it blows the AL out of the water. We needed the Bluetooth so the AL is now relegated to the garage. We loved this speaker so much we bought 2 and then bought one for my brother and sister for Christmas. Seriously, if you can get to a Staples and hear one, you'll buy one.
customer_reviews.author: MrMightyMan

customer_reviews.title: Small and full of sound.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my wife. She likes to listen to her music and cranks the volume on her iPhone, which can't be good.. This little hockey puck has room filling sound and lasts on a charge for some serious hours. A very nice speaker that connects blue tooth fast and easy. I am looking forward to using it on our vacation to listen to music on the balcony of our condo. If there's a better speaker for this price I seriously doubt it. It seems to be getting better the longer we use it. Break in period?
customer_reviews.author: P. V. Marshalek

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift because I heard a friends, the sound is excellent for being so small
customer_reviews.author: lisa hardy

customer_reviews.title: Awesome sound for a little speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what I'd hoped this would turn out to be. This little speaker delivers a true quality sound with strong bass. I've heard other brands that cost 2 to 3 times more and they didn't carry the volume this one did. I love my little JBL Wireless Bluetooth Speaker! If I had to pick one negative, I wish it had a longer battery life but 5 hours is pretty good and I can live with that. For the money, this is by far the best value in this category of speakers!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Reems

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Office
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker. I use it in my office, and people are always asking about it. In a battle of the speakers in my office, this guy came out the clear winner practically drowning out my coworkers wired speaker. It connect easily, and I find it incredibly convenient that it has its own volume control on the side so you don't have to go right for your phone or whatever you are using to play the music.
customer_reviews.author: MrsD

customer_reviews.title: Loses its pairing
customer_reviews.text: This has a really nice sound but it loses its ability to pair with previously paired devices from time to time, and you have to futz with it to get them to re-pair. I suppose if I read the manual I might find some clue about this but who has the time. :) It doesn't seem to have the greatest battery life...I would estimate five hours or less. It's still worth it, and it sounds way better than the built-in speakers on my iPad, etc. I'm not an audiophile, so this review is just about the two usage issues mentioned above.
customer_reviews.author: Audg

customer_reviews.title: OLD VERSION of DEVICE
customer_reviews.text: Would not buy this - I did and returned it. These are old versions of the speaker. This has a thumb wheel where as the new have pressure points for volume. This has no rubberized sleeve like the new ones do. I was dupped by price ($10 cheaper then the one that saw online) - don't make the same mistake.
customer_reviews.author: Rob Frazzini

customer_reviews.title: No more distorted bass from dead batteries!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size for putting in a pocket on my lunchbox. Great sound with excellent bass. I use to have a magnavox about the same size that used 3 triple a's and had to be plugged into the phone. Had almost the same sound quality of this speaker when it had a fresh set of batteries. An hour later you had to turn down the volume due to bass distortion. It's nice not having to sacrifice sound quality due to dead batteries with this speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Marcus W Austin

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker
customer_reviews.text: This speaker sounds great. After the package arrived I opened it and was almost disappointed. I looked at it and thought, "this thing is tiny! How can they charge that much for this thing?" I quickly turned it on and connected to bluetooth to my phone. As soon as it started playing, I was blown away. This thing sounded great and filled the room with sound. It has a great balance and range. The bass port makes it a nice even sound. It won't shake the floor boards--obviously, but it gives a crisp, drum-like sound. I haven't daisy chained it to any others, but I plan to shortly.
customer_reviews.author: Rick

customer_reviews.title: Impressed with the Big Sound
customer_reviews.text: Big sound for a reasonable price. The battery life on this is superb and the sound is surprisingly big for such a small speaker. Everyone who hears it comments on it, and even I was shocked. I purchased this to use while in labor with my daughter and did not have high expectations, nor was I too worried about long term use, but it has become something I use frequently for work and for working out.
customer_reviews.author: Erika D

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a wireless portable speaker for my cell phone and this product was recommended by a friend. After I read all the great reviews, I think it met all my expectations and ordered the speaker. I received the package in mail shortly and ABSOLUTELY LOVE the speaker! The appearance: small and very cute! The Make: sturdy and well made! User friendly: Extremely easy to hook up with my cell phone! The Sound: Amazing sound and plenty loud from this tiny size speaker ! Love it: Yes, LOVE IT!!!! Recommend it: Highly recommend it!!
customer_reviews.author: May

customer_reviews.title: JBL speaker
customer_reviews.text: This thing is fantastic! Take it on the patio with my MP3 and it delivers great sound, esp. considering the size. I can plug my Tao Tronics BT in my laptop about 40 feet away in another room and they also hook up. Of course there is an unending variety available with that setup.
customer_reviews.author: Alvin R. Werchan

customer_reviews.title: Yes it's that good!
customer_reviews.text: The sound reproduction from this tiny speaker awesome. Vocals sound amazing. I take this thing with me everywhere. I have two of them and I also use the chorded option and connect both together for awesome sound while watching movies on my Kindle HDX. If you're teetering on the edge of indecision, just buy one. I have my playing music all the time. I walk into stores with it playing and watch confused people trying to figure out where the music is coming from. haha
customer_reviews.author: Bio L. Titterington

customer_reviews.title: Amazing wireless speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for all the comparison reviews, I bought the JBL based on those. This little speaker packs a punch! Everyone is jealous of my little JBL. I love how I can charge with a universal USB since I already have a bunch of those. The sound is loud and clear, perfect for my apartment. My only complaint is that the range isn't very far, maybe 15 ft, so you have to stay a little close but I want to keep it close anyway so I'm happy.
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

product_meta.title: JBL Micro Wireless Ultra-Portable Speaker, Black
product_meta.description:
Color:Black

Enjoy great sound where ever you go with the ultra-portable JBL Micro Wireless speakerView larger DON’T LET THE COMPACT SIZE FOOL YOU: HEARING IS BELIEVING.
The JBL Micro Wireless is the first ultra-portable speaker featuring a Li-ion rechargeable battery, built-in bass port and wireless Bluetooth connection. With a 1-5/8-inch (40-millimeter) driver, it delivers full-range JBL sound with exceptional bass – yet it fits easily in backpacks or clips onto clothing. You can wirelessly stream audio to the speaker from any Bluetooth-equipped mobile phone or tablet, or use the included audio cable to connect the speaker to any mobile device or MP3 player. You can even daisy-chain with other JBL Micro Wireless speakers for a powerful sonic experience.

BLUETOOTH TECHNOLOGY
The JBL Micro Wireless portable speaker streams music wirelessly from any Bluetooth-equipped mobile phone or tablet, making JBL sound available for a wide range of portable devices. It’s a wireless wonder.

BUILT-IN BASS PORT
JBL speakers are famous for powerful bass. But it might surprise you to hear JBL bass this strong from a speaker this small. A built-in bass port enables the JBL Micro Wireless to generate bass that’s superior to comparable portable products.

FIVE-HOUR, LI-ION RECHARGEABLE BATTERY
The JBL Micro Wireless portable speaker has a built-in Li-ion battery that provides up to 5 hours of playback time. You can easily recharge the battery using a micro USB port, which saves you battery hassles and money.

DAISY-CHAIN CAPABILITY
If you want to add some “macro” to your Micro, you can connect the JBL Micro Wireless portable speaker to other JBL Micro Wireless speakers, creating an impressive sound environment.

An advanced driver and built-in bass port deliver superior sound quality despite its small sizeView larger WHAT'S IN THE BOX:
 * One JBL Micro Wireless speaker
 * One micro USB cable for recharging
 * One carrying pouch
 * Quick-start guide


AT A GLANCE:
 * Bluetooth technology
 * Built-in bass port
 * Five-hour Li-ion rechargeable battery
 * Portable design
 * Smart-cable design
 * LED indicator
 * Daisy-chain capability
feature_bullets: Bluetooth streaming wirelessly streams high-quality stereo music from any Bluetooth-equipped device
Built-in bass port generates impressive bass for its size and bass that’s superior to comparable portable products
Built-in Li-ion rechargeable battery that provides up to five hours of playback time and can easily be recharged using the included adapter
Smart Cable design stores in the bottom of the speaker case to prevent tangling
Chain multiple Micro Wireless speakers together to create a truly impressive sound environment

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars2,123 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
specifications.Best Sellers Rank: #2,870 in Portable Bluetooth Speakers#21,778 in MP3 & MP4 Player Accessories
